titles.title: 821 Only A Step To Jesus (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 v4 c1

authors.author: Fanny Jane Crosby | William Howard Doane

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Only a step to Jesus
Then why not take it now
Come and thy sin confessing
To Him thy Savior bow

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Only a step
Only a step
Come He waits for thee
Come and thy sin confessing
Thou shalt receive a blessing
Do not reject the mercy
He freely offers thee

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Only a step to Jesus
Believe and thou shalt live
Lovingly now He's waiting
And ready to forgive

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Only a step to Jesus
A step from sin to grace
What hast thy heart decided
The moments fly apace

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Only a step
Only a step
Come He waits for thee
Come and thy sin confessing
Thou shalt receive a blessing
Do not reject the mercy
He freely offers thee

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Only a step to Jesus
Oh why not come and say
Gladly to Thee my Savior
I give myself away
